de.tud.android.locpairs
Class CardMarkerOverlay

java.lang.Object
  OverlayItem
      de.tud.android.locpairs.CardMarkerOverlay

 class CardMarkerOverlay
extends OverlayItem

Show markers for each room that is used as scan point in a game. Has information about cardId, bmp, geoposition and roomname.
